casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Jimmie Lee BROWN, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Roger Brown, Deceased. No. 13-1187. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014. Case below, 70 So.3d 707 . Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District, denied.
